TypeSignature.Value: public class UpdateProgress : System.Web.UI.Control, System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor, System.Web.UI.IScriptControl
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UpdateProgress extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor, class System.Web.UI.IScriptControl
Public Class UpdateProgress Inherits Control Implements IAttributeAccessor, IScriptControl
public ref class UpdateProgress : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::IAttributeAccessor, System::Web::UI::IScriptControl

summary.span: 更新一个或多个 控件的内容时，在浏览器中提供可视反馈。

span.span: Provides visual feedback in the browser when the contents of one or more controls are updated.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [将 UpdateProgress 与 UpdatePanel 控件相关联Associating an UpdateProgress with an UpdatePanel Control](#associating_an_updateprogress_with_an_updatepanel_control) - [指定 UpdateProgress 控件的内容Specifying the Content of the UpdateProgress Control](#specifying_the_content_of_the_updateprogress_control) - [UpdateProgress 将控件置于上页面Putting UpdateProgress Controls on the Page](#putting_updateprogress_controls_on_the_page) - [UpdateProgress 控件显示时自定义Customizing When UpdateProgress Controls Are Displayed](#customizing_when_updateprogress_controls_are_displayed) - [应用 CSS 样式Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控制，你可以提供有关进度的局部页面呈现的反馈。The control enables you to provide feedback about the progress of partial-page rendering. 为回发或初始页呈现，控件内容不会显示。For postbacks or initial page rendering, control content is not displayed. 页面可以包含多个控件。The page can contain multiple controls. 每个可与其他关联控件。Each one can be associated with a different control. 或者，你可以使用一个控件并将其与所有关联页上的控件。Alternatively, you can use one control and associate it with all the controls on the page. 控件呈现`div`元素，用于显示或隐藏具体取决于在回发来源以及是否属性控件设置。The control renders a `div` element that is displayed or hidden depending on where a postback originates and whether the property of the control is set. ## 将 UpdateProgress 与 UpdatePanel 控件相关联Associating an UpdateProgress with an UpdatePanel Control 您将相关联控制与通过设置属性控件。You associate controls with an control by setting the property of the control. 回发事件源自内控制，任何关联控件显示。When a postback event originates from inside an control, any associated controls are displayed. 如果你未设置属性，控件显示来自任何异步回发进度控件。If you do not set the property, the control displays progress for any asynchronous postback that originates from inside any control. 它还会显示的面板的触发器任何控件。It is also displayed for any controls that are triggers for panels. 属性会产生以下影响控制行为：The property has the following effect on control behavior: - 当未设置属性，控件显示为以下回发：When the property is not set, the control is displayed for the following postbacks: - 来自任意内的回发控件。Postbacks that originate from inside any control. - 来自任何异步触发器的控件的回发控件。Postbacks that originate from controls that are asynchronous triggers for any control. - 当属性设置为控件 ID，控件显示为来自内部关联的回发控件。When the property is set to an control ID, the control is displayed for postbacks that originate from inside the associated control. 如果属性设置为不存在的控件永远不会显示控件。If the property is set to a control that does not exist, the control will never be shown. 如果属性控件设置为`false`和回发源于内控制，任何关联仍将显示控件。If the property of the controls is set to `false` and a postback originates from inside an control, any associated controls will still be displayed. ## 指定 UpdateProgress 控件的内容Specifying the Content of the UpdateProgress Control 使用属性来指定所显示的消息控件。Use the property to specify the message that is displayed by an control. 如果属性为空，则时不会显示显示控件。If the property is empty, nothing is shown when the control is displayed. 此模板可包含 HTML 和标记。The template can contain HTML and markup. 例如，你可以显示一个动画的图像，则通知用户处理回发。For example, you can display an animated image that notifies the user that the postback is processing. 你还可以显示用户可以单击停止局部页面的更新按钮。You can also display a button that the user can click to stop the partial-page update. 此外，你可能需要一个正在进行时阻止所有其他回发。Additionally, you might want to prevent all other postbacks while one is in progress. 下面的示例演示客户端脚本，你可以使用来完成这些任务。The following example shows client script that you can use to accomplish these tasks. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress4/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress4/VB/default.aspx#1)] 你可以使用此代码示例通过设置`onClick`属性`HtmlButton`控件添加到"AbortPostBack()"。You can use the example code by setting the `onClick` attribute of an `HtmlButton` control to "AbortPostBack()". 有关详细信息，请参阅该方法和类的属性。For more information, see the method and the property of the class. ## UpdateProgress 将控件置于上页面Putting UpdateProgress Controls on the Page 控件可以是内部或外部其他控件。 controls can be inside or outside other controls. 显示控件的模板不依赖于 where控件所在。The display of the control's template does not depend on where the control is located. 在嵌套控件，子面板位于父面板。In a nested control, a child panel is inside a parent panel. 在这种情况下，来自子面板内的回发导致所有与子面板和父面板中显示相关联的控件。In that case, a postback that originates from inside the child panel causes all controls associated with the child panel and the parent panel to be displayed. 如果回发源于的即时子控件的父面板，仅显示与父面板相关联的控件。If a postback originates from an immediate child control of the parent panel, only the controls that are associated with the parent panel are displayed. ## UpdateProgress 控件显示时自定义Customizing When UpdateProgress Controls Are Displayed 默认情况下，控件等待.5 秒 （500 毫秒） 它显示其内容之前。By default, the control waits .5 seconds (500 milliseconds) before it displays its contents. 这有助于防止闪烁如果异步回发进行非常快速的控件。This helps prevent the control from flashing if an asynchronous postback is very quick. 可以通过设置中指定的延迟属性。You can specify the delay by setting the property. 如果你需要更好地控制何时显示控件，你可以提供的客户端脚本和事件的类。If you need finer control over when an control is displayed, you can provide client script for the and events of the class. 在`beginRequest`事件处理程序，可以显示的 DOM 元素表示控件。In the `beginRequest` event handler, you can display the DOM element that represents the control. 在`endRequest`事件处理程序，你可将其隐藏。In the `endRequest` event handler, you can hide it. 必须提供客户端脚本来显示时目标控制控件将在以下情况下更新：You must provide client script to display an control when a target control is updated in the following circumstances: - 当从控件回发注册为面板中，一个异步回发触发器，并且没有页上的控件。When a postback from a control is registered as an asynchronous postback trigger for the panel, and there is an control on the page. 但是，属性未设置为面板的 id。However, the property is not set to the panel's ID. - 当从控件的回发注册为异步回发控件通过使用方法控件。When postbacks from controls are registered as asynchronous postback controls by using the method of the control. ## 应用 CSS 样式Applying CSS Styles 控件接受 expando 属性。The control accepts expando attributes. 这使得可能上的控件呈现 HTMLelements 设置 CSS 类。This makes it possible to set a CSS class on the HTMLelements that the controls render. 例如，你可能创建下面的示例所示的标记：For example, you might create the markup shown in the following example: ``` ``` 在前面的示例的标记上呈现 HTML 类似于以下运行页面时：The markup in the previous example renders HTML similar to the following when the page runs: ```
``` ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示使用不同方式控件以显示异步回发期间的进度。The following examples show different ways to use the control to show progress during asynchronous postbacks. 下面的示例演示一个进度状态显示为两个控件控件。The following example shows one control that displays progress status for two controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress1/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress1/VB/default.aspx#1)] 下面的示例显示了两个控件。This following example shows two controls. 每个控件将显示为一个关联的进度状态控件。Each control displays progress status for an associated control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress2/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress2/VB/default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你创建动态控件，创建一个继承自的自定义模板控件。When you create an control dynamically, you create a custom template that inherits from the control. 指定在标记方法，，然后设置属性的动态创建控件添加到自定义模板的新实例。You specify markup in the method, and then set the property of the dynamically created control to a new instance of the custom template. 当你创建控制动态，则必须在执行期间或之前页的事件。When you create controls dynamically, you must do so during or before the event of the page. 如果你创建更高版本中页的生命周期，进度控件不会显示。If you create the control later in the page life cycle, progress is not displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AssociatedUpdatePanelID { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件显示其状态的 控件的 ID。

span.span: Gets or sets the ID of the control that the control displays status for.

value.span: 关联的 控件的 ID。

span.span: The ID of the associated control.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为空字符串，这意味着控件不具有特定相关联控件。The default value is an empty string, which means that the control is not associated with a specific control. 因此，异步回发的来源于任何控件或触发器的面板原因的控件的回发控件来显示其内容。Therefore, asynchronous postbacks that originate from inside any control or postbacks from controls that are triggers for the panel cause the control to display its content. 你可以设置到相同的命名容器中、 在父命名容器中，或在页中的控件的属性。You can set the property to controls in the same naming container, in a parent naming container, or in the page.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Attributes As AttributeCollection
public: property System::Web::UI::AttributeCollection ^ Attributes { System::Web::UI::AttributeCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的级联样式表 (CSS) 特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) attributes of the control.
The names of the CSS attribute.

span.span: Gets a object that represents the child controls of the control.
The collection of child controls for the control.

span.span: Called to create any child controls that the control contains in preparation for posting back or rendering.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void DataBind() cil managed

summary.span: 将数据源绑定到 控件及其所有子控件。

span.span: Binds a data source to the control and all its child controls.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DisplayAfter { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置显示 控件之前所经过的时间值（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the value in milliseconds before the control is displayed.

value.span: 一个整数，表示在显示 控件的进度模板之前所经过的毫秒数。

span.span: An integer that represents the number of milliseconds before the control's progress template is displayed.

value.span: 默认值为 500 毫秒（.5 秒）。

span.span: The default is 500 milliseconds (.5 seconds).
The property is less than zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DynamicLayout { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值可确定是否动态呈现进度模板。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the progress template is rendered dynamically.

value.span: 如果动态呈现进度模板，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the progress template is rendered dynamically; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是否仅在需要时在页面上分配空间进度模板的内容。The property determines whether space for the progress template's contents is allocated on the page only when it is needed. 当属性是`true`，不将空间进度模板的内容分配在首次呈现页时。When the property is `true`, space for the progress template's contents is not allocated when the page is first rendered. 相反，页上更改动态需要时显示的内容。Instead, the page changes dynamically to display the contents when it is required. 在`style`属性`div`元素包含在呈现的标记中，进度模板`display`属性设置为`none`。In the `style` property of the `div` element that contains the progress template in the rendered markup, the `display` attribute is set to `none`. 当属性是`false`，进度模板的内容的空间时首次呈现页，分配和控件内容以物理方式是页面布局的一部分。When the property is `false`, space for the progress template's contents is allocated when the page is first rendered, and the control content is physically part of the page layout. 在`style`属性`div`元素包含在呈现的标记中，进度模板`display`属性设置为`block`，和`visibility`属性最初设置为`hidden`。In the `style` property of the `div` element that contains the progress template in the rendered markup, the `display` attribute is set to `block`, and the `visibility` attribute is initially set to `hidden`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ ProgressTemplate { System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ get(); void set(System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于定义 控件内容的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template that defines the content of the control.

value.span: 一个 实例，用于定义 控件的内容。

span.span: An instance that defines the content of the control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须定义模板。The template must be defined. 否则，在引发异常控件的`Init`事件。Otherwise, an exception is thrown during the control's `Init` event. 你可以指定属性以声明方式将标记添加到`ProgressTemplate`元素。You can specify the property declaratively by adding markup to the `ProgressTemplate` element. 如果在没有标记`ProgressTemplate`元素，将不会显示为控件。If there is no markup in the `ProgressTemplate` element, nothing is displayed for the control. 如果要创建控制动态，你可以创建自定义模板，继承自控件。If you are creating controls dynamically, you can create a custom template that inherits from the control. 指定在标记方法，，然后设置属性的动态创建控件添加到自定义模板的新实例。You specify markup in the method, and then set the property of the dynamically created control to a new instance of the custom template. 如果你创建控件动态，这样期间或之前页的事件。If you create controls dynamically, do so during or before the event of the page. 如果你创建更高版本中页的生命周期，进度控件不会显示。If you create the control later in the page life cycle, progress is not displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void Render (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void Render(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub Render (writer As HtmlTextWriter)
protected public: override void Render(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

param.name: writer
param.span: 一个对象，表示用于呈现 HTML 内容的输出流。

span.span: An object that represents the output stream for rendering HTML content.

summary.span: 通过使用提供的 对象，将 控件的呈现内容写入浏览器。

span.span: Writes the rendered content of the control to the browser by using the supplied object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用由控件开发人员，若要扩展的功能控件。The method is used by control developers to extend the functionality of the control. 方法将写入所呈现的内容的到浏览器通过使用所提供的控件对象。The method writes the rendered content of the control to the browser by using the supplied object. 当你重写方法在派生类中，调用基类的方法，以便子控件的呈现控件。When you override the method in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the child controls of the control are rendered.
